definition: island nation (sometimes refers specifically to Japan)

pinyin: Ban4 dao3 Guo2 ji4 Xue2 xiao4

sentences.english: Even though, the country has only one piece of land and 2 Dollar in circulation.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，这个岛国还只有一个岛和2元货币流通。

sentences.english: To my mind, the most special is the residents in Laputa.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得最特别的要数飞岛国的居民。

sentences.english: Haiti's trees and roots used to keep the mountainous island's soil in place.
sentences.chinese: 海地的树木和树根过去使这个多山岛国的土壤稳固。

sentences.english: Manhattan, it is well-known, is an island nation governed by peacocks.
sentences.chinese: 曼哈顿，众所周知，是一个被孔雀统治的岛国。

sentences.english: Li said that Fiji was the first Pacific Island country to establish diplomatic ties with China.
sentences.chinese: 李肇星表示，斐济是最早同中国建交的太平洋岛国。

sentences.english: Singapore, a lot of friends will remind of south island set in the merlion.
sentences.chinese: 提起新加坡，很多朋友会想起树立在岛国南岸鱼尾狮。

sentences.english: The police arranged to extradite the murderer from the island state.
sentences.chinese: 警方设法把杀人犯从那个岛国引渡回国。

sentences.english: The net asset of the country = 3 dollar again.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛国的净资产又变成了3元。

sentences.english: Banaba is one of the three great phosphate rock islands in the Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 巴纳巴是太平洋岛国中三大磷酸盐岩石岛之一。

sentences.english: They extradited the jewel thief from the island state.
sentences.chinese: 他们把珠宝盗窃犯从那个岛国引渡回来。

sentences.english: Barbados was the first island which actually understood the Industry.
sentences.chinese: 巴巴多斯岛是第一个真正接受这一产业的岛国。

sentences.english: The isolated homesteads form one of the biggest problems of the island.
sentences.chinese: 分散的农舍是这个岛国的一大问题。

sentences.english: The laws of the island society were educed from native customs.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛国社会的法律是由当地习俗演变而来的。

sentences.english: The island country is defended with a well- equipped navy.
sentences.chinese: 该岛国拥有一支装备精良的海军作保卫。

sentences.english: Rajaratnam was born and raised in Sri Lanka, an island nation off India's coast and the site of a long-running civil war.
sentences.chinese: 斯里兰卡是印度海岸线外的岛国，经历了长期内战。

sentences.english: Cyprus, as you know, is an island in the Mediterranean.
sentences.chinese: 如你所知，塞普路斯是地中海的岛国。

definition: United States/name of a country that formerly existed near Samarkand
Ryukyu Islands/Okinawa 沖繩|冲绳[Chong1 sheng2] and other islands of modern Japan
Republic of Palau or Belau (Pacific island nation)
Ryūkyū/refers to the Ryūkyū Islands 琉球群島|琉球群岛[Liu2 qiu2 Qun2 dao3] stretching from Japan to Taiwan/Liuchiu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
